name: Builderland2: Origins
description:
The sequel of Loriciel's Game, Builderland released in 1990. In this version, you must help your character in order to find the origins of the mysterious blocs that you control and guide him through the levels.

-----------------------

Game developped during the Retro Game Jam 2015 in Montpellier in about 36 hours with constraints.

The constraints were:

- A 128px per 128px resolution;

- 64 Ko of graphisms assets;

- Making a sequel of a Loriciel's game.

-----------------------

Game developped with Pierre Planeau and Florian Torres.
